explanation: [0-0] On a sandy construction site, a large yellow excavator has its bucket lowered into a pit. A yellow bulldozer is parked on the left, some objects are visible in the distance, and the sky is grayish-blue.

[0-3] Next, the excavator's bucket scoops up a full load of soil and lifts it into the air. The scene cuts to a construction worker wearing a yellow safety helmet, an orange and yellow safety vest, and orange-framed glasses, smiling and waving at the camera. To his right, a brown cartoon poop emoji is also waving its arms.
